element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates a new polygon layer with buffers around features in the input layer. All buffers will have the same size, regardless of the feature being buffered.

element.name: LAYER
element.text: The layer with features to buffer.

element.name: DISTANCE
element.text: The distance that defines the size of buffers to be created

element.name: TYPES
element.text:
The following methods are available: * Inside the polygon. * Inside and outside the polygon. * Outside the polygon.
This parameter applies just if the input layer contain polygons. If the input layer contains points or lines, this parameter has no effect at all, since there is just one way of creating the buffer based on them.

element.name: RINGS
element.text: The number of concentric rings to create. Each one of them will be separated from the inner ring a distance equal to the buffer distance selected in the corresponding field

element.name: NOTROUNDED
element.text: If selected, resulting polygons will not be rounded.
